bioconda.name: gridss
bioconda.summary: GRIDSS: the Genomic Rearrangement IDentification Software Suite

biocontainers.name: gridss
biocontainers.summary: A high-speed next-gen sequencing structural variation caller. it calls variants based on alignment-guided positional de bruijn graph breakpoint assembly, split read, and read pair evidence.

biotools.summary: A high-speed next-gen sequencing structural variation caller. It calls variants based on alignment-guided positional de Bruijn graph breakpoint assembly, split read, and read pair evidence.

bioschemas.name: GRIDSS
bioschemas.summary: A high-speed next-gen sequencing structural variation caller. It calls variants based on alignment-guided positional de Bruijn graph breakpoint assembly, split read, and read pair evidence.
